scripts.build:prod: yarn lint && yarn test && rimraf dist && webpack && yarn test:it
scripts.test:it:shutdown: lsof -n -i :9001 -i :9000 | grep LISTEN | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f2 | xargs kill
scripts.test:it: run-script-if --env KOGITO_TOOLING_BUILD_testIT --then 'yarn rimraf ./dist-it-tests' 'yarn build:dev' 'yarn test:it:start:online-editor:detached' 'yarn test:it:start:detached' 'sleep 20' 'jest --runInBand -c ./jest.it.config.js' --finally 'yarn test:it:shutdown'
